title: Shipping Full-Stack Features with TTM Velocity
highlights: Delivered end-to-end full-stack Jira features covering Vue.js UI, backend APIs, and worker services
Developed interactive Vue.js components with reactive state management, including sliders and drawer-based views
Built and maintained backend services following clean architecture, SonarQube standards, and proper cancellation token handling
Designed and optimized MongoDB CRUD operations with indexing to ensure reliable and high-performance data access
Implemented event-driven processing using SQS and Kafka to support scalable asynchronous workflows

title: Frontend Engineering Across Modern SPAs
highlights: Developed and maintained frontend applications primarily using Vue.js, with hands-on experience contributing to Angular SPA development across a few Agile sprints
Executed migration of legacy Vue 2 applications to Vue 3, improving application performance and code maintainability
Refactored frontend logic from Options API to Composition API, enabling cleaner abstractions and better state organization
Integrated external services such as Google Maps API to support interactive and location-based user features
Migrated state management from Vuex to Pinia and embedded Vue SPAs into a Single SPA architecture to support micro-frontend initiatives

title: Domain-Driven Backend Engineering
highlights: Designed and developed .NET APIs to meet complex business requirements using N-tier architecture across multiple enterprise applications
Migrated backend components from traditional N-tier architecture to Clean Architecture, improving modularity, testability, and long-term maintainability
Implemented distributed caching using Redis to enhance API performance and reduce database load in high-traffic scenarios
Applied Domain-Driven Design principles and established design patterns such as Factory, Mediator, and Facade within Clean Architecture components
Built secure and maintainable data access layers using Fluent API, integrating both SQL and NoSQL databases including MongoDB, while addressing Aqua scan security vulnerabilities
